name: A big challenge for a little wisp
name_original: A big challenge for a little wisp
description:
Even when you are just a little Wisp, you have a big will and honor you must defend.

Get through the biggest challenge to prove you are worthy, surviving waves of enemies, fighting them with your sword that gets larger and heavier with every kill.

Be careful! Don't let the sword get too big or your little wisp won't be able to hold it without swining.

Have fun!
